title: Apple Pie
intro: A delicious apple pie with a crispy crust.
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Prepare the crust. 3. Mix apples with sugar and cinnamon. 4. Fill the crust with the apple mixture. 5. Bake for 45 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
intro: A classic Caesar salad with fresh lettuce and homemade dressing.
ingredients:
Lettuce
Parmesan cheese
Croutons
Caesar dressing
instructions: 1. Wash and chop lettuce. 2. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese. 3. Toss with Caesar dressing.

title: Cheese Omelette
intro: A fluffy cheese omelette perfect for breakfast.
instructions: 1. Beat eggs with salt and pepper. 2. Melt butter in a pan. 3. Pour in the eggs and cook until set. 4. Sprinkle cheese and fold the omelette.

title: Banana Bread
intro: Moist and flavorful banana bread with a hint of cinnamon.
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Mash bananas and mix with sugar and butter. 3. Add flour and cinnamon. 4. Pour into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

title: Grilled Steak
intro: Juicy grilled steak with a smoky flavor.
ingredients:
Steak
Salt
Pepper
Olive oil
Garlic
instructions: 1. Season steak with salt, pepper, and olive oil. 2. Preheat grill to high heat. 3. Grill steak for 4-5 minutes per side. 4. Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Shrimp Scampi
intro: Succulent shrimp in a garlic butter sauce.
instructions: 1. Melt butter in a pan. 2. Add garlic and cook until fragrant. 3. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 4. Squeeze lemon juice and sprinkle parsley before serving.

title: Mango Smoothie
intro: A refreshing mango smoothie perfect for a hot day.
instructions: 1. Peel and chop mango. 2. Blend mango with yogurt, honey, and ice cubes until smooth.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
intro: Crispy on the edges and chewy in the center chocolate chip cookies.
ingredients:
Flour
Sugar
Butter
Chocolate chips
Eggs
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F. 2. Cream butter and sugar. 3. Add eggs and mix. 4. Stir in flour and chocolate chips. 5. Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Frozen Yogurt
instructions: 1. Mix yogurt with honey and vanilla extract. 2. Pour into a container and freeze. 3. Serve with fresh berries.

title: Homemade Ketchup
intro: Easy homemade ketchup with fresh tomatoes.
instructions: 1. Blend tomatoes until smooth. 2. Cook tomatoes with vinegar, sugar, and salt. 3. Simmer until thickened. 4. Add spices to taste.
